main event: On June 5, 1965, a witness reported seeing an unidentified flying object in Allentown, Pennsylvania.
interesting points: The object was described as having a bright, bluish-white color and was circular in shape., The sighting lasted approximately 30 minutes., The object was reported to be hovering before moving in a northerly direction., The witness estimated the altitude of the object to be between 500 to 1,000 feet., It was suspected to be a Turkey Inquiry Model (TIM) despite its unusual characteristics.
sighted object: a circular object with bright, flashing lights
witness description: Victor Guengerich, who reported the sighting.
